entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:05 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:05 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
